price: Tunge penda tungeli wateremshia kutoka mbinguni Ishara zikanyenyekea shingo zao.
arabic: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
footnotes: Sisi tunaweza kuwaletea muujiza wa kuwalazimisha Imani, wat'ii kwa unyenyekevu amri yake, na yatimie unayo yatarajia. Lakini hatuwaletei, kwa sababu mwendo wetu ni kuwaongoza watu waamini bila ya kuwalazimisha, ili isikosekane hikima ya kujaribiwa kwa mitihani, na yanayo kuja baada yake ya thawabu na adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in nasha nunazzil ʿalayhim mina al-samāi āyatan faẓallat aʿnāquhum lahā khāḍiʿīna
